thread.section_title: Terrass'' Hotel by MH - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Fantastic location,service and view!
thread.title_full: Fantastic location,service and view! - Review of Terrass'' Hotel by MH, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: elodiejones
title: Fantastic location,service and view!
text: This entire hotel has a great vibe/design as it set within the infamous Montmartre. The hotel staff is welcoming and professional, the rooms are well appointed and comfortable, plus the hotel breakfast was delicious and contained a lot of variety...not to mention an amazing view of the city. As a special touch, there was a handwritten note with 2 complimentary drinks at the hotel bar upon check-in. I cannot wait to return and enjoy the hotel, and the surrounding neighborhood in the future!
